alert.note: Alert for Weston (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 20 at 2:30PM MDT until June 20 at 3:30PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: The National Weather Service in Rapid City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Custer County in southwestern South Dakota... West central Pennington County in west central South Dakota... Southeastern Weston County in northeastern Wyoming... * Until 330 PM MDT. * At 229 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles south of Osage to 10 miles southwest of Newcastle to 2 miles southeast of Morrisey, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Newcastle around 245 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Dewey, Elk Mountain Lookout, Moon, Mallo Camp, Redbank Spring Campground and Jewel Cave National Monument. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
